mapper.select: SELECT platform_roles_member.tenant_id, platform_roles.role_id, platform_roles.role_code, platform_roles.role_name, platform_roles.description, platform_roles.enabled, platform_roles.create_time, platform_roles.update_time FROM platform_roles_member LEFT JOIN platform_roles ON platform_roles_member.role_id = platform_roles.role_id WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} and enabled = 1
